resources.string: "To ensure reliable operation please disable all power saving modes."
"اجازه اجرا در حالتی که باطری کم است"
"هنگامی که گوشی وارد حالت توان کم شد برخی از اطلاعیه ها ممکن است نادیده گرفته شود."
"اجازه می دهد به کار در حالت باطری کم . ممکن است همیشه برای اعلانهای مکرر بیش از 15 دقیقه کار کند. این تنظیم ممکن است کمی بر استفاده از باتری تاثیر گذارد."
"غیر فعال کردن صدا در حالت بیصدا"
"غیر فعال کردن لرزش در حالت بیصدا"
"روشن شدن صفحه نمایش در حالت بیصدا"
"صدای اطلاع رسانی بلیپ بلیپ غیر فعال است، چرا که دستگاه خود را در حالت بیصدا قرار داده اید"
"غیر فعال کردن صدا در حالت لرزاننده"
"غیر فعال کردن لرزش در حالت لرزاننده"
"نیروی ویبره در حالت لرزاننده حتی اگر لرزش غیر فعال است"
"روشن شدن صفحه نمایش در حالت لرزاننده"
"صدای اطلاع رسانی بلیپ بلیپ غیر فعال است، چرا که دستگاه خود را در حالت لرزاننده قرار داده اید."
"اطلاع رسانی غیر فعال شد، چرا که امروز \"روز بیصدا\" است."
"لطفا تنظیمات \"روز بیصدا\" را تغییر دهید تا بلیپ بلیپ امروز کار کند"
"غیر فعال کردن وقتی موسیقی پخش میشود"
"اطلاعیه بلیپ بلیپ در حال حاضر غیر فعال است، برای که شما در حال گوش دادن به موسیقی هستید."
"غیر فعال کردن در زمان تماس تلفنی"
"اطلاعیه بلیپ بلیپ در حال حاضر غیر فعال است، برای این که شما در یک تماس تلفنی می باشید."
"Display notification regardless if it is enabled"
"Display notification only if it is enabled"
Do not vibrate on Android Wear
"If vibration is enabled vibrate also on connected wearable device (e.g. smart watch). Requires adding System notification action."
"Changing these settings may impact reliability of the app."
"تنظیم اطلاعیه ها با تاخیر 35 دقیقه ای در برخی از دستگاه های سامسونگ"

"اطلاع رسانی در برخی از دستگاه های سامسونگ ممکن است به تعویق بیافتد. برای جلوگیری از این حالت \"زنگ هشدار\" را فعال نمایید تا این مشکل را حل کند. شما می توانید این گزینه را در تنظیمات پیشرفته فعال یا غیر فعال کنید. اگر راه حل بهتری برای حل این مشکل از طرف برنامه نویسان پیدا شود برنامه به روز خواهد شد. اگر شما متوجه هر گونه مشکلات بیشتریشدید، لطفا آنها را از طریق ایمیل با ما در میان بگذارید."
"فعال سازی حالت زنگ اگر تاخیر در اطلاع رسانی شناسایی شود"
"فعال نکردن حالت زنگ هشدار به طور خودکار"
"رفع حجم کم در برخی از دستگاه های موتورولا با افزایش قابلیت حجم. ممکن است پخش صدا توسط چند ثانیه به تاخیر بیافتد."
"غیرفعال شد. برای اکثر دستگاه ها مورد نیاز نیست."
"Displays non-dismissible notification and enables background service which might prevent killing of the app."
"ذخیره فایل اطلاعات برای گزارش اشکال از طریق ایمیل"
"فعال یا غیر فعال کردن نسخه بتا"
"اینها تنظیمات تجربی هستند و ممکن است در آینده حذف شوند"
"بررسی بلیپ بلیپ برنامه اندرویدی ساعت سنج!"
Rate us 5 stars to help make BlipBlip even more awesome. Thanks!
"لطفا مشکل خود با نرم افزار را توصیف دهید (ترجیحا به انگلیسی):"
"من یک مشکل پیدا کردم (گزارشها را پیوست کنید)"
"لطفا به ما بگویید چه چیزی می تواند به بهبود نرم افزار کمک کرده و شما را راضی کند."
"BlipBlip is translated by our users voluntarily and hereby we thank you for your support and contribution."
Try restarting app if device is low on memory. This will not work on all devices. It is not needed on most devices (may use a bit more battery).
"Do not try restarting app if device is low on memory."
"Tries to actively prevent notification delays which happen on some devices. May use more battery."
"Does not try to prevent notification delays which may occur on some devices. Uses less battery."
"Notifications should be more often accurate. May use more battery."
"Notifications may be late in rare cases. Uses less battery."
"If notification is considered delayed it won't be shown or played."
"Notifications will be shown or played even when they are delayed."
"While app plays sound, audio from other apps will be quieter or paused."
"Audio from other apps will be played normally."
"While app is playing sound other apps may pause their audio."
"While app is playing sound other apps may lower volume of their audio."
"Resets internal parameters which improve notification accuracy."
"Foreground service setting has been disabled. This may increase chance that background process is killed and app stops working."
"BlipBlip notifications are now disabled, because you are in airplane mode."
"Use color background for next notification bar."
"Use gray background for next notification bar."
"Would you like to restore default values?"
"No permission to open the file. Please open Settings and give permission to access storage."
"BlipBlip does not have permission to read the file."
"Please use some other app that shares file without need for additional permission (e.g. Google Drive)."
"Application does not have permission to read the file. Please grant the app permission to access the file. You can also share the file using other app which does not need using this permission."
"Show menus with actions that would otherwise require gestures (e.g. swiping). Useful when using TalkBack."
"Hide menus with actions that can also be performed using gestures."
"Choosing seconds is enabled. Displays times with seconds."
"Choosing seconds is disabled. Display times without seconds."
"BlipBlip notifications are now disabled, because you have headset connected."
"No email application found to send the report."
"Task killers should be disabled or BlipBlip should be added in their white lists to keep app alive."
"Foreground service option informs OS that application should not be killed if possible."
"It will display persistent notification which can be hidden from system settings (hiding it from the app will disable this option)."
"You can use button below to access system settings."
"Sound is in use and cannot be deleted."
"Vibration is in use and cannot be deleted."
"Cannot perform this operation right now. Please try again later."
"Screen is allowed to be enabled in this mode"
"Screen will not be enabled in this mode"
"These options may not work on all devices."
"Sound is disabled because following mode is active: %1$s"
"Opens system Accessibility settings where you can enable app as accessibility service"

"This service helps to keep the app working. It does not access any data or modify any content. It is just protection against memory managers which may kill the app. If you are not experiencing problems with the app you don't need to activate it."
"Helps keep app alive. Does not access any data."
"Open system settings to hide notification. This is recommended way for hiding notification because it allows the app to work in foreground."
"Text to speech engine is not yet initialized"
"Speaking will not overlap sounds (sound will play before or after speaking)"
"This is Premium sound which requires unlocking before use."
"This is Premium feature which requires unlocking before use."
"Upgrade to Premium to unlock all settings"
"By upgrading BlipBlip you not only get all features or sounds but you also support its continuous and independent development."
"User added sounds is a Premium feature"
"Make BlipBlip app yours by adding your own sounds."
"All sounds available in the app is a Premium feature"
"Customize your notification with many built-in sounds."
"Strike the hours is a Premium feature"
"Create your own grandfather clock (e.g. plays 3 times at three o'clock)"
"Use text to speech in your notifications."
"Speak current time using text to speech."
"Custom repeat interval is a Premium feature"
"Set any time interval (other than standard 1, 5, 10, 15, 20, 30 and 60 minutes)."
"Upgrade to enable notification and enjoy all Premium features."
"Unlimited active notifications is a Premium feature"
"Use many notifications with different settings at the same time (e.g. play twice at 12:00, play once at 12:30). In free version you can have one active notification."
"Unlimited silent time configuratipons is a Premium feature"
"In free version you can activate 5 silent time configurations."
"Cannot show system volume because Do Not Disturb mode is enabled"
"Automatic start of the app failed. Please check your settings."
"Some manual settings may be needed for BlipBlip to function properly."
"Please review manual settings which may be needed for app to function properly"
"App will show permanently visible notification, which may prevent app from being killed."
"Disable power saving modes in device settings"
"Disable apps that optimize battery or memory usage (e.g. task killers)"
"If your device requires changing other options, please let us now using \"Report problem\" option."
"If after trying above tips you would still have issues with the app, please report the problem."
"Lock the app on recent apps screen."
"Allow the app to work in Standby Mode."
"Add the app to Background protection whitelist."
"Settings > Device maintenance > Battery > Unmonitored apps list"
"Settings > Advanced Settings > Battery Manager > Protected Apps or Settings > Privacy and Security > Protected Apps"
"Phone Manager > Lock screen cleanup > un-check the app (don't close) or Settings > Battery > Lock screen cleanup > un-check the app (don't close)"
"Settings > Power management > STAMINA mode > Apps active in standby > Add BlipBlip"
"Settings > Additional Settings > Battery & Performance > Manage Apps Battery Usage > Choose Apps > BlipBlip > No restrictions"
"Recent apps > tap BlipBlip and pull it down"
"Security > Power > Standby Management > Set BlipBlip to run in Standby Mode"
"Long press red circle > swipe down BlipBlip"
"NeoSafe app > Power > right top settings icon > Background protection whitelist > add BlipBLip"
"NeoSafe app > Permission > Power-on speedup > Enable BlipBlip"
"Hide edit button. To enter edit mode use edit action from menu."
"Do not show recent changes on startup."
"When specifying time range show buttons which allow to specify whether given time should be included in time range."
"Hide buttons allowing to choose if time should be included in time range."
"Display message when opening the app if it was detected that the app was killed."
"Do not display message when it was detected that the app was killed."
"Get notified when you need to watch an ad to enjoy all Premium features for free"
"This app is free in exchange for watching ads."

"This app is free in exchange for watching ads. You can access all Blip Blip Premium features and sounds for specified time period after watching an ad. The more you watch the longer you can use the app."
"There are no ads in user interface or popping up unexpectedly. You always choose when you want to watch an ad."
"Want free app without ads and without Premium features? Get it here."
"Watch ad to use the app for additional: %s."
"Failed to load ad. Check your internet connection and try again."
"Can we use your data to tailor ads for you?"
"Watch more ads to get this notification"
"Watch ad to extend time for using the app"
"You will get notifications about the need of watching ads"
"You won't get any notifications about watching ads"
"Notify when app is disabled because not enough ads were watched"
"Do not notify when app will be disabled when not enough ads were watched"
"Notify when next notification won't be played because not enough ads were watched"
"Do no notify when next notification won't be played because not enough ads were watched"
"Your data will not be used to personalize ads."
"Collect anonymous, aggregated data to improve app experience."
"Anonymize IP address sent to determine user location"
"Use full IP address only for detemining user's general location (country, city)."
"Watch ads in exchange for Premium features in %1$s app."
"Press time to play back upcoming notifications"
